Crossfade::FileInfo

Crossfade::FileInfo Class Reference

Important Singleton class which tries to get as much information about a media object as possible. More...

static FileInfo Instance [get]

Detailed Description

Important Singleton class which tries to get as much information about a media object as possible.

It calls numerous helper classes to fulfill this task, eg. TagLib, fiHash, etc.

Definition at line 32 of file FileInfo.cs.

Member Function Documentation

Media Crossfade::FileInfo::getInfo ( Media  media  )  [inline]

Main function which gets passed a media object and tries to complete the missing information about this object.

It calls TagLib to read ID3v2 tags, fiHash to calculate the SHA1-hashvalue, etc.

Parameters:
media The media object which should get completed.
Returns:
The media object with hopefully more information that before.
